episodes.title: INTERVIEW: Natalie Robehmed (‘Allison After NXIVM Podcast) Lands First Interview with Allison Mack From Smallville + Her Involvement In The Nxivm Cult. Sunday, November 23rd, 2025
episodes.description: In this episode, I had the opportunity to speak with Natalie Robehmed, the host of "Allison After NXIVM," where we explored the complex and troubling journey of Allison Mack, best known for her role on "Smallville." We discussed how Allison, initially seeking personal growth, became deeply involved in the NXIVM cult led by Keith Raniere, ultimately leading to her participation in harmful practices. Natalie shared her unique experience of gaining access to Allison after her release from federal prison, revealing a remorseful and introspective side of her that contrasts sharply with the villainous image portrayed in the media. episodes.title: INTERVIEW: Ben Brown (Kody Brown’s Nephew) Talks Being Raised In A Cult, Advice For The Sister Wives, And His Famous Brown Cousins. Sunday, October 26th, 2025 | Sarah Fraser
episodes.description: ICYMI, this was a HUGE interview for me in the fall of 2024 with a Sister Wives family member, Ben Brown. Ben gives his insights about Kody, Robyn, Christine, Meri, Janelle, and his cousins. For reference, Ben Brown is Kody Brown’s nephew and spent a fair amount of time with the family when he was younger. I had an engaging conversation with Ben Brown, a comedian and TikTok star known for his candid takes on his upbringing in a polygamous family.. episodes.title: INTERVIEW: Ben Brown (Kody Brown’s Nephew) Talks Being Raised In A Cult, Advice For The Sister Wives, And His Famous Brown Cousins. Wednesday, October 30th, 2024 | Sarah Fraser
episodes.description: I had an engaging conversation with Ben Brown, a comedian and TikTok star known for his candid takes on his upbringing in a polygamous family, being a nephew of Kody Brown from the Sister Wives franchise. Ben discussed the challenges of growing up poor in a polygamous household governed by strict beliefs, the complexities of family dynamics, and the misconceptions surrounding polygamy. Plus, does he stay in touch with Kody Brown and his cousins. Ben offers Janelle, Meri, and Christine advice now that they’re free, talks TLC and profiting off children, Garrison’s passing, and more. Timestamps: 00:00:00 - Introduction to Ben Brown 00:10:00 - History of Mormonism, Brown family history, when Kody and his dad became polygamists. 00:29:00 - Ben chats mormonism as a cult, Janelle’s mom marrying his grandmother, child abuse and more 00:35::00 - Does he stay in touch with Kody and his cousins, Ben slams TLC, and gives advice for Janelle, Meri, and Christine Live Virtual Podcast Halloween Edition!
